translated: In this way, it is not mentioned that one should draw the mandala of consecration as explained in the secret mandala, nor is any other rite of consecration in the secret mandala taught.🔽However, in the section on teaching the benefits of entering the secret mandala,

translated: it is stated:

analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun zhes bya ba ni 'dir 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams gzung ngo //

analyzed: de dag la dbang ba ni bri ba dang / lung 'bogs pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The mastery of these is the ability to write, to expound, etc.

analyzed: de yang shugs kyis slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba rnams thob nas 'thob bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: And this is obtained by the force of the consecration of the Master, it is explained.

analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bcug pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i lung /

translated: Therefore, this mental consecration, the consecration with the seal of the arising of all limbs by the rite that will be explained below, and the external consecration explained above are the three kinds.

analyzed: rnam pa 'di gsum gyi mtshan nyid kyang rgyud las bshad de /

translated: The first world is the world of the theists, such as Visnu, Mahesvara, and Brahma.

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhen /

analyzed: gang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i gzugs de la /

translated: Secret Lord, when they abide in the meditative absorption of the absence of attributes, at that time the secret mantra of the tathāgatas will be revealed and will be inclined toward them.

analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i dmigs pa med pa'i phyir /

analyzed: gang ma skyes pa de ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar rnam par gzhag par rung ba ma yin no //

original: de'i phyir sems la dus gsum yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sems la dus gsum yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore the mind does not exist in the three times.

translated: Now, the scriptures that investigate the mind, which has the nature of apprehendeds and apprehenders, as primordially unborn and non-arisen are:

translated: The term “false imagination” is a synonym for “unreality.”🔽“Unreality” is not known as “unborn.”

original: mi shes so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: mi shes so zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being said.

analyzed: de la 'dir yid ces bya ba gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa yin par dgongs te /
translated: Here, the “mind” is the consciousness that has the aspect of apprehendeds and apprehenders.

original: de skad du 'di las /
analyzed: de skad du 'di las /
translated: In this way, it says:

analyzed: dkar po ser po dmar po gang /

original: yid kyis sems par byed pa ste //
analyzed: yid kyis sems par byed pa ste //

analyzed: de la yongs su gcod pa gang //

original: de ni sems kyis byed pa yin //
analyzed: de ni sems kyis byed pa yin //
translated: is what the mind does.

original: sems ni mgu nas nges gyur pa //
analyzed: sems ni mgu nas nges gyur pa //
translated: The mind, having become satisfied,

original: ting nge 'dzin zhes bsgrags pa yin //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin zhes bsgrags pa yin //
translated: is proclaimed to be meditative stabilization.

original: rnal 'byor der gnas rdzogs sangs rgyas //🔽rkang gnyis dam par bsam par bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor der gnas rdzogs sangs rgyas // rkang gnyis dam par bsam par bya //
translated: The yogi/nī who abides in that yoga is a perfect buddha,

original: zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: zhes gsungs so ;
translated: to be considered the best of humans.

original: /'dir dkar po ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: /'dir dkar po ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
